EmailTemplate.name: Customer Lead Response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Your Request for Information from {!Organization.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in {!Organization.Name} We will be contacting you shortly. If you'd like to provide a convenient date/time for your call, please respond to this email and we'll do our best to accommodate.
Sincerely,
The Team at {!Organization.Name}
